bibles.title: Laz Luke (Bible Portion)
bibles.copyright: © Bible Society in Turkey (Kitabı Mukaddes Şirketi) 2020

language.name: Laz
language.area: Northeast, Rize, Kemer, Atin, Artasen, Vitse, Arkab, Hopa, Sarp; Artvin, Sakarya, Kocaeli, and Bolu provinces. Also in Belgium, France, Georgia, Germany, United States.

bibles.title: Syriac Bible (Peshitto)
bibles.title_vernacular: ترجمة النسخة السريانية للانجيل المعروفة بالبسيطة

language.name: North Mesopotamian Arabic
language.area: Tigris, part of the Euphrates valleys north of Baghdad. Also in Jordan, Syria, Turkey (Asia).

language.name: North Azerbaijani
language.area: Also in Armenia, Estonia, Georgia, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Russian Federation (Asia), Turkmenistan, Ukraine, Uzbekistan.

language.name: Northern Kurdish - Kurmanji
language.area: Hakkari, Siirt, Mardin, Agri, Diyarbakir, Bitlis, Bingol, Van, Adiyaman, and Mus, most; also Urfa, Kars, Tunceli, Malatya, Erzurum, Marash, Sivas, and other provinces; communities in central Turkey (Cankiri, Cihanbeyli, near Konya); many in large cities in the west, including Istanbul, Adana, Ankara, Izmir. Also in Afghanistan, Armenia, Australia, Austria, Azerbaijan, Bahrain, Belgium, Canada, Denmark, Finland, France, Georgia, Germany, Greece, Iran, Iraq, Italy, Jordan, Kazakhstan, Kuwait, Kyrgyzstan, Lebanon, Netherlands, Norway, Russian Federation (Europe), Sweden, Switzerland, Syria, Turkmenistan, United Kingdom, United States.

language.name: Tajik
language.area: Also in Iran, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Russian Federation (Asia), Turkmenistan, Ukraine, Uzbekistan.

bibles.title: Turkish Kutsal Kitap
bibles.copyright: © The Bible Society in Turkey (Kitabı Mukaddes Şirketi), The Translation Trust / Yeni Yaşam Yayınları 2001, 2008

language.name: Turkish
language.area: Widespread in Turkey as L1 or L2. Also in Australia, Austria, Azerbaijan, Belgium, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Bulgaria, Canada, Cyprus, Denmark, Egypt, El Salvador, Finland, France, Georgia, Germany, Greece, Honduras, Iran, Iraq, Israel, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Macedonia, Netherlands, Romania, Russian Federation (Asia), Serbia, Sweden, Switzerland, Tajikistan, Ukraine, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom, United States, Uzbekistan.

bibles.title: Turkish Bible (Kitab-ı Mukaddes Şirketi Version)
bibles.description: Through the Bible publishing experience since 1818 in almost all the languages and alphabets used in Anatolia, the Bible Society in Turkey aims to make available the Scriptures in all platforms which the modern technology offers.
bibles.description_vernacular: Türkiye’deki Kitab-ı Mukaddes Şirketi olarak, 1818 yılından bu yana Anadolu topraklarında kullanılan hemen hemen tüm dillerde ve alfabelerde Kutsal Kitap (Tevrat, Zebur ve İncil) yayıncılığı tecrübemizle ürünlerimizi teknolojinin sunduğu yeni platformlarda okurlarımıza sunmaya gayret ediyoruz.

language.name: Turkish
language.area: Widespread in Turkey as L1 or L2. Also in Australia, Austria, Azerbaijan, Belgium, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Bulgaria, Canada, Cyprus, Denmark, Egypt, El Salvador, Finland, France, Georgia, Germany, Greece, Honduras, Iran, Iraq, Israel, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Macedonia, Netherlands, Romania, Russian Federation (Asia), Serbia, Sweden, Switzerland, Tajikistan, Ukraine, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom, United States, Uzbekistan.
